entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
